commit.message:
c-typeck.c (build_indirect_ref): Use COMPLETE_OR_VOID_TYPE_P and VOID_TYPE_P.

	* c-typeck.c (build_indirect_ref): Use COMPLETE_OR_VOID_TYPE_P
	and VOID_TYPE_P.
